summary: The world's richest man has joined a growing chorus of right-wing voices attacking Wikipedia as part of an intensifying campaign against free and open access information
title: Elon Musk and the right’s war on Wikipedia

summary: Lukasz Olejnik writes about device fingerprinting, and why Google’s policy change to allow it in 2025 is a major privacy setback.
title: Google Is Allowing Device Fingerprinting

summary: You don’t have to, of course; I know some people prefer to go into books without any major hints or spoilers to the plot.  But if that’s not you, here’s an excerpt from Chapter Two in the book (why Chapter Two.  because it lends itself to excerpt-y-ness more than Chapter One)...
title: Catch an Excerpt of “When the Moon Hits Your Eye” on Polygon
